sections.title: Membership List
paragraphs: The following is a complete listing of the more than 1900 members of the Association for Computational Linguistics. The individual members are listed first, ordered alphabetically by last name. The institutional members in the U.S. begin on page 188; those outside the U.S. on page 190.
